about_the_game:
.

CONTROLS:
Camera Movement : W-A-S-D
Mouse Scroll : Zoom In , Zoom Out
Mouse Right Click : Close All Turret Range
Mouse Left Click : Select

Dive into a post WW1 fiction where you lead the people for the independence of Izmir.
Our game combines the theme of world war 1 and the future, offering you a different tower defense gameplay.

Fight for the beloved city of Izmir's independence, a tower defence strategy game. Lead the common people of Izmir with tech gear from the future but be aware of holding the balance otherwise people could go nuts.

Enemy Categories:
Try to fight using the right weapons against 3 different enemy classes: Infantry, Armored and Robotic. Beat the toughest levels with the right combinations and bonus damage.

Communication with Characters to Obtain Cards:
To earn relationship points with characters; Listen to the wishes of the characters. Make jokes about them. Spread the gossip.
Buy their cards according to your relationship points with the characters and pass the levels with the attributes of the cards.

Different Lines of Vision:
Every character in the game thinks differently and your relationship with them changes with every choice you make. Hence you must consider your decisions wisely.

Game Progress:
After every level you proceed you take little steps towards vast possibilities of the interactive storyline.

name: Izmir: An Independence Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: On-board
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
